Sentencas: The entire world is facing a great shortfall in the energy supply due to the high consumption rate of fossil fuel-based energy resources.
Titulo: Ternary Alkali Carbonates Effect on Electrochemical Characterization of Nanocomposite Calcium-Doped Ceria Electrolytes (LNK-CDC) for SOFC

Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are the best alternative energy devices, which convert hydrogen fuel directly into electricity.
Titulo: Ternary Alkali Carbonates Effect on Electrochemical Characterization of Nanocomposite Calcium-Doped Ceria Electrolytes (LNK-CDC) for SOFC

Sentencas: Alkali carbonated calcium-doped ceria electrolytes (LNK-CDC) as (Ce0.8Ca0.2), (Ce0.7Ca0.3), and (Ce0.6Ca0.4) were synthesized by the co-precipitation method.
Titulo: Ternary Alkali Carbonates Effect on Electrochemical Characterization of Nanocomposite Calcium-Doped Ceria Electrolytes (LNK-CDC) for SOFC

Sentencas: With the addition of alkali carbonate, nanocomposites of ceria are well preserved after sintering at 600-700 degrees C.
Titulo: Ternary Alkali Carbonates Effect on Electrochemical Characterization of Nanocomposite Calcium-Doped Ceria Electrolytes (LNK-CDC) for SOFC

Sentencas: The structural and morphological properties were examined by X-ray diffraction (XRD) and scanning electron microscopy (SEM), respectively.
Titulo: Ternary Alkali Carbonates Effect on Electrochemical Characterization of Nanocomposite Calcium-Doped Ceria Electrolytes (LNK-CDC) for SOFC

Sentencas: Crystallite sizes were found in the range of 50-80 nm.
Titulo: Ternary Alkali Carbonates Effect on Electrochemical Characterization of Nanocomposite Calcium-Doped Ceria Electrolytes (LNK-CDC) for SOFC

Sentencas: The maximum ionic conductivity of LNK-CDC (Ce0.8Ca0.2) was achieved to be 0.14 S/cm at 650 degrees C for anion vacancy migration by the dense microstructure.
Titulo: Ternary Alkali Carbonates Effect on Electrochemical Characterization of Nanocomposite Calcium-Doped Ceria Electrolytes (LNK-CDC) for SOFC

Sentencas: The minimum activation energy was determined to be 0.23 eV.
Titulo: Ternary Alkali Carbonates Effect on Electrochemical Characterization of Nanocomposite Calcium-Doped Ceria Electrolytes (LNK-CDC) for SOFC

Sentencas: The Fourier-transform infrared spectroscopy (FTIR) spectra of the prepared materials show the absorbance of IR and their behavior.
Titulo: Ternary Alkali Carbonates Effect on Electrochemical Characterization of Nanocomposite Calcium-Doped Ceria Electrolytes (LNK-CDC) for SOFC

Sentencas: The maximum power density of symmetric fuel cells LNK-CDC sandwiched with LNCZ oxide electrodes was recorded as 0.52 W cm(-2) at 650 degrees C in the presence of hydrogen (fuel).
Titulo: Ternary Alkali Carbonates Effect on Electrochemical Characterization of Nanocomposite Calcium-Doped Ceria Electrolytes (LNK-CDC) for SOFC

Sentencas: It is suggested that coating of the equal molar ratio of ternary alkali metals on ceria doped comparatively enhance the performance of new nanocomposite electrolyte for SOFC and other energy applications.
Titulo: Ternary Alkali Carbonates Effect on Electrochemical Characterization of Nanocomposite Calcium-Doped Ceria Electrolytes (LNK-CDC) for SOFC
